Sidney Crosby

Full Name: Sidney Patrick Crosby

(Sid The Kid, Sid, The Next One, Darryl, Creature, The Squid, Bing, Golden Boy, Captain Canada, Squidney)

Position: C •  Shoots: Left

5-11, 200lb (180cm, 90kg)

Team: Pittsburgh Penguins

Born: August 7, 1987 in Cole Harbour, Nova Scotia ca

Draft: Pittsburgh, 1st round (1st overall), 2005 NHL Entry

Amateur Teams: Rimouski Oceanic

Current salary: $3,000,000

Current cap hit: $8,700,000

Pronunciation: \SIHD-nee KRAWZ-bee\

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Sidney Crosby?

Sidney Crosby is 37 years old.

When was Sidney Crosby born?

Sidney Crosby was born on August 7, 1987.

Where was Sidney Crosby born?

Sidney Crosby was born in Cole Harbour, Canada.

How tall is Sidney Crosby?

Sidney Crosby is 5-11 (180 cm) tall.

How much does Sidney Crosby weigh?

Sidney Crosby weighs 200 lbs (90 kg).

How many goals does Sidney Crosby have?

Sidney Crosby had 42 goals last season and 592 goals over his career.

How many points does Sidney Crosby have?

Sidney Crosby had 94 points last season and 1,596 points over his career.

How much is Sidney Crosby worth?

Sidney Crosby made $3,000,000 last year.

How many Stanley Cups has Sidney Crosby won?

Sidney Crosby has won 3 Stanley Cups as a player.
